name: Guomin Yang
content: YANG Guomin | School of Computing and Information Systems | School of Computing and Information Systems showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS YANG Guomin Full-time Faculty Associate Professor of Computer Science; Coordinator, BSc (CS) Cybersecurity Track Research Statement Qualification PhD, City University of Hong Kong, 2009 Teaching Topics Introduction to Programming Foundations of Cybersecurity Data Security and Privacy Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to LI Huilin WANG Jiaheng +65 68264928 gmyang@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas School of Computing and Information SystemsInformation Systems & TechnologyCybersecuritySafety, Security & FairnessTrustworthiness of Digital Platforms & DevicesMisinformation & DisinformationPrivacy-Preserving Data Sharing & Analytics Strategic Priorities Digital Transformation
